DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate difference wall shear stress distribution among different type drug-eluting stent impact vessel heal evaluate intravascular optical coherence tomography evaluation .
DOC.brief_title: Relation Among Shear Stress Distribution , Stent Design , Subsequent Vessel Healing After Drug-eluting Stent Implantation ( SHEAR DES )
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Distribution wall shear stress ( WSS ) may different accord stent design . The impact WSS stent implantation may impact future vessel heal current generation drug-eluting stent implantation . Although previous study use IVUS ( intravascular ultrasound ) angiography determine WSS computational fluid dynamic ( CFD ) simulation , new method use high resolution OCT ( optical coherence tomography ) warrant evaluate impact stent design WSS current generation drug-eluting stent . Methods : For purpose , enroll total 30 patient stable angina schedule percutaneous coronary intervention . Those patient randomize thin-strut ( 81μm ) 2-link Promus element ( PE : n=10 ) , thin-strut ( 81μm ) 3-link Xience Prime ( XP : n=10 ) , thick-strut ( 145μm ) 2-link Nobori stent ( NO : n=10 ) underwent OCT coronary CT angiography ( CTA ) stenting . Post stent WSS calculate use CFD simulation base patient-specific reconstruct 3D artery create fusion OCT CTA data , normalize use WSS proximal unstented region . Also , follow-up angiography OCT perform assessment vessel heal well WSS distribution 8months stent implantation .
DOC.criteria: Older 20 year old . Indication PCI Xience prime , Nobori , Promus element . Clinical diagnosis stable angina , unstable angina silent ischemia reference vessel diameter range 2.53.5mm . Underwent CT angiography PCI . To agree review record clinical course research protocol . Previous history pancytopenia , liver function , renal dysfunction , hypersensitive history drug . Low ejection fraction ( LVEF < =30 % ) , impaired liver function , renal dysfunction ( eGFR < =40 ) Severe calcification Stent restenosis
